entry.data:
MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE UPPER 40S
WEST WINDS AROUND 5 MPH

SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN PARTLY SUNNY WITH A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE AFTERNOON
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 50 PERCENT

PARTLY CLOUDY
A CHANCE OF SHOWERS AND THUNDERSTORMS IN THE EVENING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S
NORTHWEST WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH
CHANCE OF RAIN 40 PERCENT

PARTLY SUNNY
HIGHS IN THE UPPER 50S
NORTH WINDS 10 TO 15 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
LOWS IN THE MID 30S
NORTH WINDS 5 TO 10 MPH

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 60S
LOWS IN THE LOWER 40S

PARTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
NOT AS COOL WITH LOWS IN THE UPPER 50S

PARTLY SUNNY IN THE MORNING, THEN BECOMING MOSTLY CLOUDY
HIGHS IN THE LOWER 70S

MOSTLY CLOUDY IN THE EVENING, THEN CLEARING
LOWS IN THE MID 40S

MOSTLY CLEAR
HIGHS IN THE MID 60S
LOWS IN THE UPPER 30S
